divs: Sighting Details1. walking out side from seeing it from my living room 2. when i was looking at it though my window 3.i don't now it didn't make a sound 4.well it looked like an circle or something like that 5. i was excited and run out the door and saw it again 6.when i told my uncle about and they saw it and did not really say anything
Summary: i was in my living room and look out side though my window and saw somthing floating and went out side and saw it again and it kepp going straight
